text: is a Japanese manga artist. He is known for creating the series K-On! which was also adapted as an anime by Kyoto Animation. ==Works== * (2007, Houbunsha) (2010, English licensing Yen Press) ** (2011, Houbunsha) ** (2011, Houbunsha) ** (2018, Houbunsha) * Kanamemo (end card illustration, ep 8) (2009) * Yuyushiki (end card illustration, ep 8) (2013) ==References== ==External links== * Kakifly Official website * Category:Living people Category:Manga artists Category:Manga artists from Kyoto Prefecture Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Kakifly
